attributes.action: Stop nurseries exploitative 'top up fees' of FEE & Childcare
attributes.additional_details:
Is your child in nursery and eligible for the FEE scheme?
Are you really getting 15 hours free?
Find out – ask your council how much they pay your nursery
eg. 1 wk = £115 - £65 (council) = £50
My bill is £70. Instead of deduct the council payment from mine, nursery got creative with their rates and revised the DAILY fee I was paying (£3.50/h meals incl) to an HOURLY fee of £4+meals. The regulations set by the government are open to interpretation and nurseries are using this 'loophole' to indulge themselves. £20/w = £760/y the nursery is receiving – for one child! x40 children =£30k/y for 1 nursery! IT'S HAPPENING ALL OVER THE COUNTRY
I've contacted my local council (disinterested) and MP, who then involved MP Nicky Morgan (Sec. State for Ed.) both politely said although this 'top up fee' exploit is 'unacceptable' it's up to the local council to take action
The scheme needs readdressing to be fairer to parents and not line nursery owner’s pockets!
